metadata.name: Indivisible x Patrick Amadon: Grandmaster of Glitch
metadata.description:
This is the genesis NFT minted by Indivisible: a composable media exploration of crypto, creativity and freedom by design. 

This piece combines the cover image + audio for Episode 8 of the Indivisible podcast with artist Patrick Amadon to create a mixed-media token. It is also embedded within a written post on mirror.xyz that can be collected by fans. 

The cover image is rendered in glitch as a nod to Amadon's distinctive artistic style. This rendition was made possible under the innovative parameters of CCO copyright, which Amadon designates for his work. 

By collecting this NFT you are supporting Indivisible on its journey to explore the edges of crypto in content and style. 

indivisible.fm
